title: Maayavi Maayavi English Lyrics Mugamoodi
stanzas:
Song: Maayavi
Singer: Chinmayi
Movie: Mugamoodi
Music: KrishnaKumar(K)

Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Maayaavi Maayaavi theeyaagi varuvaan
Manadhodum mugamoodi
 anindhethaan thirivaan
Thalai thodum azhaiyena
elundhiduvaan nenjil
Annaithidum mazhaiyena nanaithidivaan

Maayaavi Maayaavi theeyaagi varuvaan ...
Manadhodum mugamoodi
anindhethaan thirivaan

Bayam moolum neram
tharai vandhu kaapaan
Thuyarkonda perai
karai kondu serppaan
kadamai mudindhaal parandhiduvaan
paavi, ivalin thuyaram marandhiduvaan

Avanodival idhayam tholaiyum..
thanimai theruvil
ivalodavan nizhazhum azhaiyum

Maayaavi Maayaavi theeyaagi varuvaan
Manadhodum mugamoodi
anindhethaan thirivaan

Thalai thodum azhaiyena
elundhiduvaan nenjil
Annaithidum mazhaiyena nanaithidivaan

Aezhunooru kodi mugam ingu undu
azhagaana ondrai yevar kandadhundu?
Manadhor uruvam varaikiradhe - kaatril
kanavaai adhuvum karaikiradhe

Kodumai adhil kodumai yedhuvo
vizhigal irundhum unai kaanave
mudiyaadhadhuvo ?

Maayaavi Maayaavi theeyaagi varuvaan
Manadhodum mugamoodi
 anindhethaan thirivaan
Thalai thodum azhaiyena
elundhiduvaan nenjil
Annaithidum mazhaiyena nanaithidivaan

 English Translation
I tried my best :)
A Magician will come like a fire
He will roam with mask
in his face all the time
He will raise as a big sea wave
in mind and he will drench us
like a defusing rain

A Magician will comes like a fire.
He will roam with mask
in his face all the time

At scary times,
he’ll save us all.
He’ll save people
who are in danger.
He’ll fly away after doing his job
and he will forgot her grief

He’ll leave his heart with her
In lonely street, his shadow
will be always with her

A Magician will comes like a fire.
He will roam with mask
in his face all the time

He will raise as a big sea wave
in mind and he will drench us
like a defusing rain

There are 700 faces here but
Who saw a beautiful face here?
Minding is drawing a personality,
but its vanishing in dream.

Sad, What sad is ..
Though eyes are there,
cannot you see you.

 A Magician will comes like a fire
He will roam with mask
in his face all the time
He will raise as a big sea wave
in mind and he will drench us
like a defusing rain
